Comment: Because the press didn't actually do their job. Negative coverage of Biden on the campaign trail vastly outweighed coverage of Trump. Biden could stutter, and headlines would run for weeks about how it's not clear he's fit for office. Trump makes clearly racist comments, and it's a subheading that gets mentioned once and never again. If you look at coverage of Trump in particular compared to nearly every major presidential candidate for the last few decades, it's abundantly clear that the press either didn't know what to do with some of the things he did and said because they were so outlandish, or they were biasing coverage. Most candidates would have had their campaigns end instantly if they'd done even one of the many bizarre and offensive things he's done over the years. Howard Dean's campaign fell apart just because he got excited and yelled weirdly and the press ripped him apart for it.
